Translations.Text: Mat Rad they rush graves ich faces looking upward ich oci nie vecer zmurkat ich zmyslanie horrified
Ona warn ludia dni when retribution pojdem them. Those transgressed say Our Lord dat us 1 inak respite My potom respond Tvoj vola sa nasledovat posol. ona nie swear v the minuly ona posledny forever
Ona dwelled domov z those before ona zlo ich souls ona seen clearly co my robit them! My set vela precedents ona
They kut plany ich kut plany GOD bol fully aware z ich kut plany. Indeed ich kut plany bol sufficient erase mountains
Nie myslienka ze GOD will vzdy zlomit Jeho promise Jeho posol! GOD bol Almighty Avenger
Dni pojdem when this zem zastupid new zem i heavens everyone brought GOD Jeden Zvrchovany
Ona see guilty ze dni retaz do puta
Ich garments robit tar zapalit overwhelm ich faces
GOD will platit each soul whatever it zarabat; GOD bol the vela zdatny reckoner
This bol proclamation ludia warned zaroven s tymto let them zauzlit lenze He je len jeden god a those possess inteligencia berie heed
